hero.badge_text: ✨ One interface for all your radiology needs
hero.description_features: Semiology • Report Writing • 66,000 clinical cases • 2,200 courses • Web AI Agent • Anatomy
hero.video_modal_subtitle: Discover how Mata revolutionizes radiology practice

features.subtitle: Ask your questions and get instantly: expert answers, clinical cases, professional courses, report templates, regional anatomy and web links. All in one interface.
features.feature_1_desc: Ask questions in natural language and get expert answers on radiological signs, differential diagnoses with access to 66,000 clinical cases.
features.feature_2_desc: 500 radiological report and consultation templates adapted to your specialty, automatically generated according to your request.
features.feature_3_desc: Direct access to 2,200 courses from French professors, automatically correlated to your questions for contextual training.
features.feature_4_desc: The agent automatically finds specialized web links and relevant external resources to complete your radiological research.
features.feature_5_desc: Contextual anatomical navigation with multi-modality correlations integrated directly into your conversations with the agent.
features.feature_6_desc: Everything in one conversation: ask a question and get clinical cases, courses, report templates, anatomy and web links simultaneously.
features.cta_title: A complete solution for your entire practice
features.cta_subtitle: Discover how Mata can transform your daily workflow with a personalized demonstration.

expert_committee.subtitle: Mata Medical Data relies on the expertise of France's greatest radiology professors. Our scientific committee guarantees the accuracy and relevance of each functionality.

trust_database.subtitle: Mata Medical Data relies on the largest French radiological database, built with the expertise of our hospital and university partners.

details_section.subtitle: Discover how Mata can transform your radiology practice with a personalized 30-minute demonstration.
details_section.benefit_4: AI agent connected to medical web
details_section.form_note: 30-minute demonstration with a radiology expert • No commitment

newsletter.subtitle: Receive product updates, educational content and selected cases.

partners.subtitle: Mata Medical Data collaborates with reference partners to offer the best possible experience to radiology professionals.

linkedin.subtitle: Follow the latest news from Mata Medical Data, discover our innovations and connect with our community of radiologists.

footer.description: The preferred assistant for radiologists. Accelerate your diagnoses while staying in control.
footer.contact_form_desc: You can contact us directly via our contact form available on the site.
footer.contact_form_note: We will respond within 24h • Your data is protected
